metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data of Wudaoliang diorite in the Hoh Xil area, northern Tibet
metadata.titleCn: 藏北可可西里地区五道梁闪长岩的地球化学数据
metadata.description: The data set includes major and trace elements, major mineral elements, whole rock SR – Nd isotope, zircon u – Pb age and Hf isotope data of diorite. Samples were collected from diorite in Wudaoliang area of Hoh Xil block, northern Tibet. Zircon U-Pb dating data were obtained by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. Hf isotopic data of zircons were obtained by laser ablation multiple acceptor inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The major and trace geochemical data of the whole rock are obtained by X-ray fluorescence spectrometry and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The data of major elements in minerals are obtained by electron microprobe analysis. The whole rock SR – Nd isotopes were obtained by sample separation and purification multi receiver inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS). Through the data obtained, we can define the age, origin and deep dynamic mechanism of magmatism in the region, and provide knowledge on the origin of high magnesian characteristics of continental crust.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本文数据集包含闪长岩的全岩主量元素和微量元素、矿物主量元素、全岩Sr–Nd同位素、锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素数据。样品采集自西藏北部可可西里地块五道梁地区的闪长岩。锆石U-Pb年代学数据是通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得的。锆石Hf同位素数据是通过激光剥蚀-多接受电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得的。岩石全岩主微量地球化学数据是通过X荧光光谱仪和电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得的。矿物主量元素数据是通过电子探针分析获得的。岩石全岩Sr–Nd同位素是通过样品分离提纯-多接收电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得的。通过获得的数据，可以限定区域内岩浆作用的时代、成因以及深部动力学机制，并对大陆地壳高镁安山质特征的起源提供认识。
metadata.instructions: All data are stored in Excel file. The file name "zirupb. XLS" represents zircon U-Pb geochronology data. The file name "zirhf. XLS" represents zircon Hf isotope data. The name of the file "wrmajtraiso" represents the major, trace and isotopic geochemical data of the whole rock. The name of the file is "minmaj", which represents the data of mineral major elements.
metadata.instructionsCn: 所有数据以Excel文件存储。文件名称为"ZirUPb.xls"代表锆石U-Pb年代学数据。文件名称为"ZirHf.xls"代表锆石Hf同位素数据。文件名称为“WRMajTraIso”代表全岩主微量和同位素地球化学数据。文件名称为“MinMaj”代表矿物主量元素数据。

literatureList.titleEn: Petrogenesis of the Late Triassic diorites in the Hoh Xil area, northern Tibet: Insights into the origin of the high-Mg# andesitic signature of continental crust
literatureList.referenceEn: Wang, J., Gou, G.-N., Wang, Q., Zhang, C., Dan, W., Wyman, D. A., & Zhang, X.-Z. (2018). Petrogenesis of the Late Triassic diorites in the Hoh Xil area, northern Tibet: Insights into the origin of the high-Mg# andesitic signature of continental crust. Lithos, 300-301, 348-360. doi:10.1016/j.lithos.2017.12.007

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of geochemical datasets related to diorite rocks in the藏北可可西里地区五道梁 region?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与藏北可可西里地区五道梁的辉长岩相关的地球化学数据集的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: whole-rock major and trace elements, mineral major elements, whole-rock Sr–Nd isotopes, zircon U–Pb ages, Hf isotopic data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全岩主量和微量元素，矿物主量元素，全岩Sr-Nd同位素，锆石U-Pb年龄，Hf同位素数据

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different isotope analyses are conducted in a dataset related to the geochemistry of diorite from the Wudaoliang area in the northern Tibet Hoh Xil block?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与北部藏北霍西尔块的五道梁地区的辉长岩地球化学相关的数据集中，进行了多少种不同的同位素分析？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the meaning of '锆石U–Pb年代学数据' in the context of geochemical data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: '锆石U–Pb年代学数据'在地球化学数据收集的背景下指的是通过铀-铅（U-Pb）同位素测定法对锆石矿物进行年代测定所获得的数据。这种方法常用于确定岩石和矿物的形成年龄。
Definition.AnswerEn: 锆石U–Pb年代学数据 refers to the zircon U-Pb geochronological data, which are obtained by analyzing zircon minerals using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) to determine the age of rock formations.
Definition.AnswerCn: 锆石U–Pb年代学数据是通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）分析锆石矿物获得的，用于确定岩石形成的年龄。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be drawn about the magmatic activity and deep dynamic mechanisms in the Tibetan region from analyzing the geochemical data and isotopic compositions of diorites?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 通过分析青藏地区辉长岩的地球化学数据和同位素组成，可以得出关于岩浆活动和深部动态机制的见解。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The geochemical data and isotopic compositions of diorites offer insights into the timing, origin, and deep dynamic mechanisms of magmatic activity in the Tibetan region. By examining zircon U–Pb ages and Hf isotopes, along with whole-rock Sr–Nd isotopes and major-trace geochemistry, researchers can constrain the age, genesis, and tectonic processes underlying the magmatic activities. This helps in understanding the characteristics and origin of high-magnesium andesitic features in the continental crust.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 辉长岩的地球化学数据和同位素组成为了解青藏地区岩浆活动的时序、起源和深部动力机制提供了线索。通过研究锆石U-Pb年龄和Hf同位素，以及全岩Sr-Nd同位素和主要-微量元素地球化学，研究人员可以约束岩浆活动的年龄、成因和构造过程。这有助于理解大陆地壳中高镁安山岩特征和起源。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes on the understanding of regional magmatic processes when using a dataset that includes whole-rock major and trace element geochemistry, mineral major element data, whole-rock Sr–Nd isotopes, zircon U–Pb ages, and Hf isotopes?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用包含全岩主要和微量元素地球化学、矿物主要元素数据、全岩Sr–Nd同位素、锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素的数据集，可能对区域岩浆过程的理解产生以下潜在结果。
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using a dataset that includes whole-rock major and trace element geochemistry, mineral major element data, whole-rock Sr–Nd isotopes, zircon U–Pb ages, and Hf isotopes can lead to a more comprehensive understanding of the timing, origin, and deep dynamic mechanisms of regional magmatic processes. It also enhances insights into the origin of high-magnesium andesite characteristics in continental crust.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用包含全岩主要和微量元素地球化学、矿物主要元素数据、全岩Sr–Nd同位素、锆石U–Pb年龄和Hf同位素的数据集，可以更全面地理解区域岩浆过程的时序、起源和深部动态机制。这也增强了对大陆地壳中高镁安山岩特征起源的洞察。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the objective behind collecting geochemical and isotopic data from diorite samples in the Tibet Kekexili block to understand magmatic processes and crustal dynamics?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集来自藏区可可西里块的辉长岩样品的地球化学和同位素数据，以了解岩浆过程和地壳动态的目标是什么。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to define the age, origin, and deep dynamic mechanisms of magmatism in the region and to provide insights into the origin of high-magnesium andesitic characteristics of continental crust.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是定义该地区的年龄、起源和深层动态机制，并提供对大陆地壳高镁安山岩特征起源的见解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the instrumental techniques and procedural steps used to obtain geochemical data and isotopic ages from diorite samples in the藏北可可西里地区五道梁闪长岩 region, and how do these methods contribute to understanding magmatic activity and crustal characteristics?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在藏北可可西里地区五道梁闪长岩中获取花岗岩样品的地球化学数据和同位素年龄所使用的仪器技术和程序步骤是什么？这些方法如何有助于理解岩浆活动和地壳特征？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The instrumental techniques and procedural steps involve collecting diorite samples from the五道梁 region in northern Tibet, followed by the analysis of zircon U-Pb ages using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS). Zircon Hf isotopic data are acquired through laser ablation-multicollector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-MC-ICP-MS). Whole-rock major and trace geochemical data are obtained using X-ray fluorescence (XRF) spectroscopy and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS), while mineral major element data are analyzed using electron probe micro-analysis (EPMA). Whole-rock Sr–Nd isotopic compositions are determined through sample separation and purification followed by analysis with multi-receiver inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICP-MS). These methods allow researchers to define the timing, origin, and deep dynamic mechanisms of magmatic processes in the region and provide insights into the origin of high-magnesium andesite characteristics in continental crust.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 仪器技术和程序步骤包括从北 Tibet 的五道梁地区收集辉长岩样品，随后使用激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）分析锆石的U-Pb年龄。锆石的Hf同位素数据通过激光剥蚀-多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-MC-ICP-MS）获得。全岩主要和微量地球化学数据使用X射线荧光（XRF）光谱法和电感耦合等离子体质谱法（ICP-MS）获得，而矿物主要元素数据则通过电子探针显微分析（EPMA）进行分析。全岩Sr-Nd同位素组成通过样品分离和纯化后，使用多接收器电感耦合等离子体质谱法（MC-ICP-MS）进行分析。这些方法使研究人员能够定义该地区岩浆过程的时间、起源和深层动态机制，并提供对大陆地壳中高镁安山岩特征起源的见解。
